userStory.what: to have the training options clearly marked for the following information: day and time of training, title, short summary, Trainers, level, number of registrations, remaining registrations, location of training, link to full details of the training, register now link
userStory.why: I can shop for training all with one page AND find their class on on one page

question.descricao: Does the user story implementation involve some output?
Does the user story implementation involve some output?

requirements.descricao: Verify that context-aware, preferably automated - or at worst, manual - output escaping protects against reflected, stored, and DOM based XSS. ([C4](https://owasp.org/www-project-proactive-controls/#div-numbering))
